Traditional markets are worried about Tet purchasing power,

Luan Do Fine Arts started to welcome Tet
market customers at traditional markets,
especially wholesale markets in
Ho Chi Minh City, which started a
few weeks ago. This year, the goods at the market are quite
diverse.  The variety of designs and types
is very reasonable in price.
However, the purchasing power is still weak. Small
businesses are still nervous in the
market. Every year, this price of lemongrass imports
about 10 tons of all kinds. But this year
it has decreased.  There are only 2 to 3 tons left. This is
the inevitable result after years of purchasing power at
the market is unprecedentedly gloomy. For example, if there are 10
joints, there are only five or six joints, so people
buy a little and don't dare to buy
a lot.  This year, the market seems to be a bit empty
compared to last year, but it's probably because
it's still early to look here. Everything is available
in the face of reduced purchasing power due to economic difficulties.
Merchants are also reducing
profits to stimulate economic growth.  I like the market even though the price of
rich products has increased this month. I see that all the
shrimp have decreased a lot. Next, it's about 800,000,
but I make an average profit. There are 20,000 mkg,
but just to sell the price. 8 buyers
can only reduce the price.  From 20 to 30, we are
flexible so that the products we sell quickly increase
the sales power of the market, add
online sales channels and improve the
quality of finished products, while still maintaining the
same price without sudden price increases.
Along with changing import methods to
diversify product types,
small businesses are also actively applying
many forms of sales to stimulate
the market, waiting for purchasing power to improve soon
in the days leading up to the Lunar New
Year.  This
is also the time when many specialties of
Ca Mau province such as goby fish and snakehead fish are
harvested to serve the market
this year.
Accordingly, in the past week or so, the price of
commercial products has increased from 100,000 VND
to 150,000 VND per kg of 40 animals per kg, thanks to
which many households raising after deducting expenses
have made a profit of several tens to several hundred
million.  Depending on the scale of farming, in many
other farming areas of Ca Mau province, there are still
many farming households that are not in a hurry to harvest,
including many households that have released fish into
rice fields for a while to reduce the amount of
industrial feed to help fish meat.  It is probably
more delicious because it is predicted that the more time
you need Tet, the higher the fish price will be. According
to the local authorities,
the reason for the increase in the price of commercial goby fish
is because the amount of goby fish raised this year is
not much along with other factors.
Environmental weather affects the available productivity of
fish, leading to a decrease in supply.
While the need for drying to serve the
Tet market is entering its peak
in Ca Mau province, goby farming has
developed over the past 10 years.  According to statistics, up to
now, Ca Mau province has more than 50
goby fish ponds with an area of ​​​​more than 40
hectares in Long Kien commune, Cho Moi district,
An Giang province.
Although it has only been established for only 2 months, there is a farming business club.
There were 20 members participating. The
special thing is that the members of the
club are mostly local billionaires. The
meeting between
members of the rural business club
in Long Kien commune these days  The experience of taking
care of trees is shared with
each other sincerely. Uncle Tu, the seedling tree is
now big. Second, Uncle Tu.
How can I do this? Uncle Tu let it perch.
Then we have to go to the next steps.
Fertilizers, foliar fertilizers, adding
boron substances to increase the level of Chalk
so that it can set fruit and bear a lot of fruit. In
this club, those with a lot of people will cultivate up to 12 hectares,
but those with a small amount will also have 1 hectare if the seeds are
valuable.  Each hea can earn a profit of over a billion
dong, so people often joke that this is the
durian billionaire club because they see that
durian trees have economic potential,
so they established a club to exchange.  It is no
coincidence that
this club is called rural entrepreneurs.
Even though the participants are only
agricultural farmers because of the
long-term orientation of the club, it is not a coincidence that this club is called rural entrepreneurs.  The club is to
establish a business to create a premise to
directly export durian to the
world market
after 3 years of operation.

According to statistics from idc and canallys after more than
a decade, 2023 is the first year that
Apple surpasses Samsung in global smartphone sales,
recently released data from idc and canallys  canalys shows that
Apple ranks above Samsung in the number of phones
sold in
2023, specifically Apple sold
234.6 million devices compared to Samsung's 26.6 million devices,
currently the American technology giant accounts
for 20.1% of the global market share.
While Samsung's was 16.3,
Apple's sales breakthrough was most evident
in the fourth quarter of 2023 with 80.5 million
iPhones sold, an increase of 11.6 minutes over the same
period last year. Meanwhile, Samsung saw a
decrease  Both the number of units produced and the market share of the
Korean phone company spent
53 million units shipped, a decrease of 10.9 PH compared to the fourth quarter
of 2022, causing the share to also decrease from
16.3 according to idc's success.  Apple
owes much of its success to the growing trend of
high-end devices, which now account for more than 20
markets, from its
incentive program to exchange old goods to compensate for
new goods and its
interest-free installment purchase plans.  idc analysts
also said that the
fragmented Android phone market is also part of the
reason for Apple's Breakout
in a new study by the
Smith Ocean Institute, California, USA.  There are at
least
four new species of deep-sea octopus off the
coast of Costa
Rica. They were discovered along
submarine mountains off the Pacific coast.
This is an area more than 258 km wide with a
diverse concentration of deep-sea octopus species that
we discovered.  We discovered these species at a
depth of 3,000 meters.
Our remote-controlled waterfalls captured
images of them moving up and down. The
data we collected showed that these species lay their
eggs in areas with warm water currents.
Currently, the research team is
further analyzing the living conditions of
new species, specifically Collecting information on
Oxygen, temperature, and compounds in water in the
habitats of these species discovered during
the exploration of the ranges.  The team's underwater mountain collection
in December
this survey collected more than 160 samples of
Deep Sea Animals. These surveys are
regularly conducted by the Smith Ocean Institute
to promote conservation of the regional ecosystem.
In addition, the deep sea is also looking for
legal measures to ensure
this goal. Famous for its 102nd unique architecture
in the world, the town of Alobo in Italy is
where many tourists come, let's
see  The world heritage of flower promotion is
nicknamed this mushroom lane.
What makes the ancient village of Alberobello
famous is the undulating conical roofs
covered with glass on the hills. They are made
up of dry lime slabs
planted on top of each other.  Using cement mortar
and being surrounded by whitewashed walls
from thick stone houses also helps
these houses stay cool in the summer and in the
winter. This is the first time I
visited Mr. Bero and felt this.  a
particularly beautiful village and the
only place in Italy with mushroom-shaped houses
like this. Sleeping under the
mushroom roofs is a very impressive experience
in addition to its unique architecture.
I had the opportunity to explore
local specialties and souvenirs. I
went to some of the best restaurants in town.
Also, the sunsets and sunrises were breathtaking. I really look
forward to extending my stay here.
In
1996, UNESCO included the
traditional architectural style of this town in the list of
world cultural heritages that need to be
protected. Ladies and gentlemen of the UK House of Representatives,
the two Pakki brothers over the years have
built  A huge collection of clocks
of up to 750 pieces. This collection has
been attracting many tourists to
visit their home and register to stay overnight
to experience the nostalgic space of the
collection.  Their collection is
considered the largest in the world. Mr.
Rom started building this collection in his
20s. Because at that time, he
was diagnosed with only
3 more years to live, so he devoted all his time to
Doing what you love,
your collection is now very large and has become
a museum named after your brother
supports you in managing
this museum. I am proud to call this collection the Great
Wall of Bronze.  The clock has a
very important meaning to us. Many people have
come and asked to sleep with us to
hear the time and the ticking of
these clocks. Over the years, the two brothers have
received many compliments.  They offered to buy back
these watches at a very high price,
but they decided not to sell them because they
treasured them. The thing they care most about
now is finding a
suitable successor when they get older.  The
36th London Art Market
has just opened to welcome visitors from January 17.
This year's event introduces to the
public many highly creative contemporary works
and addresses hot issues
of the world.  Expecting to
revive the art market in the UK, which has been facing
many difficulties in the
past year, the works are diverse not only in
theme but also in material.
Consumers can see works made
of Lego plastic pieces.  or
old passports that attract attention is an

his team spent more than 120 hours
combined with graffiti art to create this work.
project on environmental impacts in

our works are facing certain difficulties in society. Our works are
